snippet: Hungarian businessman Lorinc Meszaros, an ally of Prime Minister Viktor Orban, has acquired stakes in Opimus, which owns the publisher of several of the country's main newspapers, a stock exchange filing showed....

headline.main: How Donald Trump Wins by Losing

lead_paragraph: Hungarian businessman Lorinc Meszaros, an ally of Prime Minister Viktor Orban, has acquired stakes in Opimus, which owns the publisher of several of the country's main newspapers, a stock exchange filing showed.
